sections.installation:
To use WP Secure Content, you will need:
* an installed and configured copy of [WordPress][]

(version 3.0 or later).

* FTP, SFTP or shell access to your web host

upgrade_notice.1.1.2: Sanitized input and fixed direct file access issues.
upgrade_notice.Upgrades:
To upgrade an existing installation of WP Secure Content to the most recent release:

  1. Download the WP Secure Content installation package and extract the files on your computer.
  2. Upload the new PHP files to wp-content/plugins/wp-secure-content, overwriting any existing wp-secure-content files that are there.
  3. Log in to your WordPress administrative interface immediately in order to see whether there are any further tasks that you need to perform to complete the upgrade.
  4. Enjoy your newer and hotter installation of wp-secure-content
